message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you 40, but I want 60. It's a good starting point for me.
I'll meet you in the middle. 55 for me, 45 for you. Your turn!
I'll take 70, you can have 30. I think I'm getting closer to a good deal.
I'm not giving up yet! 45 for me, 55 for you. Take it or leave it!
